item.title: Win11 Debloat
item.description: I’ve been using windows for my workstation for a long time, mainly due to lots of software just refuse to work under VMs or wine and me being well too adjusted with windows environment.

item.title: powershell - Merge CSVs
item.description: Preface CSV is a tabular data exchange format and is used dangerously extensively by data scientists, engineers, or analyst alike.
